Detailed Description

Common interface for an object, which delivers a 2D-calibration.

Member Function Documentation

virtual const ICalibration2d* i2d::ICalibrationProvider::GetCalibration ( ) const [pure virtual]

Get access to transformation object, which transforms a local logical coordinate system to global one.

Returns:
Pointer to transformation if it is accessible, or NULL.

Implemented in iview::CCalibratedViewBase, iimg::CBitmap, iqt2d::CImageViewComp, i2d::CStaticCalibrationProviderComp, and i2d::CObject2dBase.
